name: openpoa-web
description: OpenPOA (OP) - Fast & Reliable Ethereum Sidechain with known independent validators
author: Stephen Arsenault <hashguide@thecryptoist.com> cloned from Chris Hitchcott <chris@hitchcott.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf ./docs; gatsby build --prefix-links;echo 'End of Gatsby build' && echo '*************'; echo 'Moving public to docs' && mv ./public ./docs;echo 'Copying CNAME to docs folder' && cp ./CNAME ./docs/CNAME;echo 'Copying favicon.png to docs folder' && cp ./assets/favicon.png ./docs/favicon.png
